footer.disclaimer: This site has only an informational intent. The author does not carry any responsibility for creating trains against {tos}!
footer.version-check: Site is complete for version {version} of Train Driver 2 simulator

preview.title: RAILWAY VEHICLE PREVIEW
preview.desc: Choose a railway vehicle above to see its preview

stocklist.title: STOCK EDITOR
stocklist.alert-copied: The rolling stock has been copied to your clipboard!
stocklist.prompt-file: Name a file and download it to the Presets folder (Documents/TTSK/TrainDriver2):
stocklist.coldstart-info: Cold start heading locomotive (only locos 303E & 203E type)
stocklist.warning-not-suitable: EP07 & EP08 type locomotives are designed for passenger traffic only!
stocklist.warning-passenger-too-long: Maximum length of a passenger train may not be greater than 350m!
stocklist.warning-freight-too-long: Maximum length of a freight train may not be greater than 650m!
stocklist.warning-too-many-locos: This train has too many traction units!
stocklist.warning-too-heavy: This train is too heavy! Check {href}

stockgen.title: FREIGHT TRAIN GENERATOR
stockgen.properties-desc: ⇐ Add a locomotive in the first place of the stock list to include it in a drawing!
stockgen.cargo-desc: Choose cargo you want to fill available cars with:
stockgen.chosen-empty-warning: Choose at least one cargo type to see available cars!
stockgen.chosen-warning: Cars containing chosen cargo are shown below. Hover over a type to see a preview of the car. Click it to include/exclude it from a drawing (only highlighted types will be included).

numgen.title: TRAIN NUMBER GENERATOR
numgen.alert: The number has been copied to your clipboard!
numgen.td2-wiki: > Polish rules of train numbering (TD2 wiki)
